author: Byron Roberts
message: It is not the mistake that has the most power, instead, it is learning from the mistake to advance your own attributes.
title: Thought of the day

author: Thich Nhat Hanh
message: The amount of happiness that you have depends on the amount of freedom you have in your heart.
title: Thought of the day

author: Carl Jung
message: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.
title: Thought of the day

author: Babatunde Olatunji
message: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. And today? Today is a gift. That is why we call it the present.
title: Thought of the day
